description: An exceptional listening experience that’s tailored just for you. The WF-1000XM4 truly wireless headphones take industry-leading noise cancelling1 and audio quality to the next level. Made to fit every ear, they offer a personalised experience that adjusts to every situation.

specification.BATTERY LIFE(CONTINUOUS MUSIC PLAYBACK T: Max. 8 hrs(NC On) / Max. 12 hrs(NC Off)
specification.BATTERY LIFE(CONTINUOUS COMMUNICATION TI: Max. 5.5 hrs(NC On) / Max. 6.0 hrs(NC Off)
